name: Doomsday Cult (LD50 - Delay the Inevitable)
description:
This is my entry for LD50, Doomsday Cult.

It's a card game where you, as a cultist, have to delay the arrival of a cosmic horror in order to bargain for a still definite but better ending for yourself or humanity.

There are currently 5 possible endings depending on your results (try to find all!)

You start with a deck of cards. Your objective is to go as long as possible and stall the game while gaining resources and artifacts. You can either:

- Play a card, and if you win, you get its rewards.

- Skip a card, then it goes to the bottom of the deck and gets stronger.

Each card has a special "action" which you must fulfill.

If you mouse over some icons on the game you can see a help text.

The only available control scheme for the game is Keyboard & Mouse.

Spacebar - Clap.

Mouse - Buttons and Drawing.

It's available on WebGL (play on browser)

It has no sounds/music.

Source Code: https://github.com/ConradoClark/ld-50-delay-the-inevitable
